detailed_goals: Submit refined character designs (first pass).
Submit rough environment sketches (key locations).
Review environment sketches with the team and gather feedback.
Develop core gameplay features (e.g., character abilities, enemy AI).
Prototype UI elements (e.g., health bars, menus).

Set up initial monitoring for build performance.
Define test cases for core gameplay mechanics.
Conduct initial smoke tests on prototype builds.
Refine character models based on feedback.
Begin rigging and basic animations for key characters.
Monitor progress against Week 1 milestones.
Schedule and facilitate cross-team sync meetings.
